title: The Good food show. series 2
brief_description: Gabrielle Gate takes us through a series of episodes which focus not only on good eating, but good health also. The emphasis is on freshness, quality and the excellence of Australian produce. Guest chefs appear on the programs to offer the viewers a range of delicious recipes and ideas. The programs on this tape are: Fishy tales; The Humble spud; Sweet temptations and Something special.
